introduction: Welcome to the Environmental Engineering Lab

experiments.name: Determination of TS,TDS and TSS in water
Determination of Total Iron in water

UG: B. Tech./ B.E in Civil Engineering and Environment Engineering

objective: Projects funded by Govt. of India for the welfare of rivers like Namami Gange involves various water treatment test to analyse the physio chemical and bacteriological properties of water. This lab provides the knowledge about properties of water and explains the various method followed in the test along with its suitability as a drinking water.

courseAlignment.description: The syllabi of this lab aligns to the following universities in India.
universities: Environmental Engineering - National Institute of Technology Karnataka Surathkal, APJ Abdul Kalam Technological University, Goa University
Environmental Engineering II - APJ Abdul Kalam Technological University
Environmental Engineering Laboratory - National Institute of Technology Karnataka Surathkal, APJ Abdul Kalam Technological University
Water and Waste Water Analysis Laboratory - Anna University
